name: Marble Knight
description:
Marble Knight is a 2D roguelike where the goal is to traverse the 3 procedurally generated layers of your ant colony, and defeat the bugs and creatures that have invaded. What danger lurks for you at the end of your journey?

Controls:

- WASD : Movement

- Mouse Cursor : Aim Sword

- Left Click : Swing Sword

- Right Click : Dodgeroll / Pick Up Marble / Throw Marble (Hold to charge throw)

Hint: Try hitting the marble with your sword!
